languages.english-overview:
ImpressPages CMS is user friendly software. Its tools enable user to manage the content of website in a convenient way. The advantage of ImpressPages is the opportunity to see how the website which is being edited will look like after the changes.
All the information could be administered directly in the website. There is no need to perform monotonous lay-out tasks.
Insertion of text, pictures, galleries and video is very simple.
ImpressPages CMS is released under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE.

english-features.font: It erases all HTML and CSS trash (tags, styles, etc.), but leaves exactly what you expect and need: bold, italic, underline, links, lists, paragraphs, line breaks. All styles are automatically transformed to already defined website styles.

From the very beginning CMS kernel has been developed considering the needs of SEO. The system/software automatically performs the major part of this task. Your website will have better ranking in search engines.

font.li: automatic generation of SEO friendly URLs;
setting of title, keywords, description and URL values for each page;
content widgets are compatible with SEO recommendations for content.

english-features.font: Internal page linking is made easy. Just browse the page tree and click on the page you need. Link is inserted automatically. If you have a link, system automatically select that page in a tree and shows you where it is.
